import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import xgboost as xgb

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')
validation = pd.read_csv('data/validation.csv')

# Define target
target = 'SalePrice'

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Remove target from numerical columns
numerical_columns.remove(target)

# Feature engineering: Create age features
train['Age'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearBuilt']
train['RemodAge'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearRemodAdd']
test['Age'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearBuilt']
test['RemodAge'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearRemodAdd']

# Feature engineering: Create basement-related features
train['TotalBath'] = train['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * train['BsmtHalfBath']
test['TotalBath'] = test['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * test['BsmtHalfBath']

# Feature engineering: Create total living area features
train['GrLivAreaRatio'] = train['GrLivArea'] / (train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
test['GrLivAreaRatio'] = test['GrLivArea'] / (test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create garage-related features
train['GarageAreaPerCar'] = train['GarageArea'] / (train['GarageCars'] + 1)
test['GarageAreaPerCar'] = test['GarageArea'] / (test['GarageCars'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create porch and deck area ratios
train['PorchArea'] = train['WoodDeckSF'] + train['OpenPorchSF'] + train['EnclosedPorch'] + train['ScreenPorch']
test['PorchArea'] = test['WoodDeckSF'] + test['OpenPorchSF'] +

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import xgboost as xgb

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Define target
target = 'SalePrice'

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Remove target from numerical columns
numerical_columns.remove(target)

# Feature engineering: Create age features
train['Age'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearBuilt']
train['RemodAge'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearRemodAdd']
test['Age'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearBuilt']
test['RemodAge'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearRemodAdd']

# Feature engineering: Create basement-related features
train['TotalBath'] = train['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * train['BsmtHalfBath']
test['TotalBath'] = test['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * test['BsmtHalfBath']

# Feature engineering: Create total living area features
train['GrLivAreaRatio'] = train['GrLivArea'] / (train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
test['GrLivAreaRatio'] = test['GrLivArea'] / (test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create garage-related features
train['GarageAreaPerCar'] = train['GarageArea'] / (train['GarageCars'] + 1)
test['GarageAreaPerCar'] = test['GarageArea'] / (test['GarageCars'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create porch and deck area ratios
train['PorchArea'] = train['WoodDeckSF'] + train['OpenPorchSF'] + train['EnclosedPorch'] + train['ScreenPorch']
test['PorchArea'] = test['WoodDeckSF'] + test['OpenPorchSF'] + test['EnclosedPorch'] + test['ScreenPorch']
tra

from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer

from sklearn.metrics import r2_score

test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

numerical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import xgboost as xgb

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Define target
target = 'SalePrice'

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Remove target from numerical columns
numerical_columns.remove(target)

# Feature engineering: Create age features
train['Age'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearBuilt']
train['RemodAge'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearRemodAdd']
test['Age'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearBuilt']
test['RemodAge'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearRemodAdd']

# Feature engineering: Create basement-related features
train['TotalBath'] = train['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * train['BsmtHalfBath']
test['TotalBath'] = test['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * test['BsmtHalfBath']

# Feature engineering: Create total living area features
train['GrLivAreaRatio'] = train['GrLivArea'] / (train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
test['GrLivAreaRatio'] = test['GrLivArea'] / (test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create garage-related features
train['GarageAreaPerCar'] = train['GarageArea'] / (train['GarageCars'] + 1)
test['GarageAreaPerCar'] = test['GarageArea'] / (test['GarageCars'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create porch and deck area ratios
train['PorchArea'] = train['WoodDeckSF'] + train['OpenPorchSF'] + train['EnclosedPorch'] + train['ScreenPorch']
test['PorchArea'] = test['WoodDeckSF'] + test['OpenPorchSF'] + test['EnclosedPorch'] + test['ScreenPorch']
tra

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.preprocessing import OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.impute import SimpleImputer
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
import xgboost as xgb

# Load data
train = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Define target
target = 'SalePrice'

# Identify categorical and numerical columns
categorical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns.tolist()
numerical_columns = train.select_dtypes(include=[np.number]).columns.tolist()

# Remove target from numerical columns
numerical_columns.remove(target)

# Feature engineering: Create age features
train['Age'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearBuilt']
train['RemodAge'] = train['YrSold'] - train['YearRemodAdd']
test['Age'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearBuilt']
test['RemodAge'] = test['YrSold'] - test['YearRemodAdd']

# Feature engineering: Create basement-related features
train['TotalBath'] = train['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * train['BsmtHalfBath']
test['TotalBath'] = test['BsmtFullBath'] + 0.5 * test['BsmtHalfBath']

# Feature engineering: Create total living area features
train['GrLivAreaRatio'] = train['GrLivArea'] / (train['1stFlrSF'] + train['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)
test['GrLivAreaRatio'] = test['GrLivArea'] / (test['1stFlrSF'] + test['2ndFlrSF'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create garage-related features
train['GarageAreaPerCar'] = train['GarageArea'] / (train['GarageCars'] + 1)
test['GarageAreaPerCar'] = test['GarageArea'] / (test['GarageCars'] + 1)

# Feature engineering: Create porch and deck area ratios
train['PorchArea'] = train['WoodDeckSF'] + train['OpenPorchSF'] + train['EnclosedPorch'] + train['ScreenPorch']
test['PorchArea'] = test['WoodDeckSF'] + test['OpenPorchSF'] + test['EnclosedPorch'] + test['ScreenPorch']
tra
